00032 #define DECLARE_WEBUPDATEACTION(classname, string)                              \
00033 public:                                                                                                                 \
00034     classname() : wxWebUpdateAction(string) {}                                  \
00035     virtual ~classname() {}                                                                             \
00036                                                                                                                                 \
00037 public:                                                                                                                 \
00038         /* Sets the property names & values for this action. */         \
00039         virtual bool SetProperties(const wxArrayString &propnames,      \
00040                                                         const wxArrayString &propvalues);       \
00041                                                                                                                                 \
00042         /* Run this action. */                                                                          \
00043         virtual bool Run() const;                                                                       \
00044                                                                                                                                 \
00045         /* Returns a copy of this action. */                                            \
00046         virtual wxWebUpdateAction *Clone() const                                        \
00047                 { /*wxLogDebug(wxT(#classname) wxT("::Clone"));*/               \
00048                         return new classname(*this); }                                          \
00049                                                                                                                                 \
00050         DECLARE_CLASS(classname)
00051
